title: Rust Lifetime Coercion Exploration
description: In this lab, the concept of coercion in Rust is explored, where a longer lifetime can be coerced into a shorter one to enable functionality within a specific scope. This can occur through inferred coercion by the Rust compiler or by declaring a lifetime difference using syntax such as <'a: 'b, 'b>.

meta.title: Rust Coercion | Lifetime Concepts
meta.description: Explore the concept of coercion in Rust, where a longer lifetime can be coerced into a shorter one to enable functionality within a specific scope.

verify.name: This step has no verification at the moment
verify.hint: This step has no verification at the moment

i18n.title: 探索Rust生命周期强制转换
i18n.description: 在本实验中，探索Rust中的强制转换概念，即较长的生命周期可以被强制转换为较短的生命周期，以便在特定范围内实现功能。这可以通过Rust编译器的推断强制转换，或者使用诸如<'a: 'b, 'b>这样的语法声明生命周期差异来实现。

meta.title: Rust强制转换 | 生命周期概念
meta.description: 探索Rust中的强制转换概念，其中较长的生命周期可以被强制转换为较短的生命周期，以便在特定范围内实现功能。
meta.keywords: Rust, 强制转换, 生命周期, 编程, 概念
